batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('microsoft-webdav-miniredir/')) AND lower(http_request.http_method) = lower('get'))

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Administrative scripts that download files from the Internet 2. Administrative scripts that retrieve certain website contents 3. Legitimate WebDAV administration Reference: https://mgreen27.github.io/posts/2018/04/02/DownloadCradle.html
